NotFoundPage.title: Page not found

LocaleLayout.name: Mesfah | Best Car Wash & Service Centers
LocaleLayout.description: Mesfah offers the best car wash and service in Riyadh. We use nano-wax, filtered water, genuine oils, and professional technicians to ensure the highest quality. With free services and a special loyalty program.

Hero.title: Best car wash and service with quality assurance and free services.

CarWash.title: About the Car Wash
CarWash.lifelinesWax: We have a contract with Lifelines for waxes.
CarWash.waxProperties: The wax contains nano-material + zero salts.
washingSteps: Special towels for each part (car body, glass, interior).
CarWash.satisfactionGuarantee: If the customer is not satisfied with the wash -> we redo it.
CarWash.loyaltyProgram: Loyalty Program: Every 4 washes = 5th is free.

ServiceCenter.title: About the Service Center
ServiceCenter.oils: Original and certified oils from main dealers.
ServiceCenter.pricing: Wholesale prices + only a 10 SAR service fee.
tires: Contracts with all major companies (Pirelli, Goodyear, Continental, Hankook...).

CustomerPromise.title: Mesfah Values
values: A package of free services for every customer.

Footer.companyDescription: Mesfah is your premier destination for car wash and service in Riyadh. We are committed to providing the highest levels of quality and care for your vehicle.
